message: Today I released the first Metior gem. Or two to be accurate.
Version 0.1.0 was missing the right dependencies which makes it de facto unusable for users without the right gems installed. That's why I pushed 0.1.1 right afterwards.
So have fun testing it and feel free to report issues, suggest features and contribute.
Ok, after more bugfixing the gem should be finally working. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Just released another bugfix version 0.1.4. It fixes some more problems and should be the last in the 0.1.x series.
